select hosp_id as hospId, cl_cd as clCd, addr, cl_cd_nm as clCdNm, emdong_nm as emdongNm, estb_dd as estbDd, hosp_url as hospUrl, post_no as postNo, sggu_cd as sgguCd, sggu_cd_nm as sgguCdNm, sido_cd as sidoCd, sido_cd_nm as sidoCdNm, telno, yadm_nm as yadmNm, ykiho, hosp_status as hospStatus
from hospital
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM TB_USER_MASTER where role = "user"
SELECT COUNT(*) AS active_users FROM TB_USER_MASTER WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' and role = "user"
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_hospitals FROM TB_HOSPITAL_MASTER
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS user_count FROM user GROUP BY city ORDER BY user_count DESC
SELECT sido_cd_nm AS province, COUNT(*) AS hospital_count FROM hospital GROUP BY sido_cd_nm ORDER BY hospital_count DESC

SELECT h.yadm_nm AS hospital_name, COUNT(hr.hosp_reservation_id) AS reservation_count FROM hospital_reservation hr JOIN hospital h ON hr.hosp_id = h.hosp_id GROUP BY hr.hosp_id ORDER BY reservation_count DESC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(reservation_at, '%Y-%m') AS month, COUNT(*) AS reservation_count FROM hospital_reservation GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT h.yadm_nm AS hospital_name, AVG(hr.hosp_review_rating) AS average_rating FROM hospital_review hr JOIN hospital h ON hr.hosp_id = h.hosp_id GROUP BY hr.hosp_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC
SELECT h.yadm_nm AS hospital_name, SUM(p.amount) AS total_amount FROM payment p JOIN hospital h ON p.hosp_id = h.hosp_id GROUP BY p.hosp_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC

SELECT h.yadm_nm AS hospital_name, (SUM(hr.attended) / COUNT(hr.hosp_reservation_id)) * 100 AS attendance_rate FROM hospital_reservation hr JOIN hospital h ON hr.hosp_id = h.hosp_id GROUP BY hr.hosp_id ORDER BY attendance_rate DESC
SELECT DATE(created_at) AS date, COUNT(*) AS new_users FROM TB_USER_MASTER GROUP BY date ORDER BY date

SELECT h.yadm_nm AS hospital_name, COUNT(hr.hosp_review_id) AS review_count FROM TB_HOSPITAL_REVIEW_HISTORY hr JOIN TB_HOSPITAL_MASTER h ON hr.hosp_id = h.hosp_id GROUP BY hr.hosp_id ORDER BY review_count DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT DATE(hrh.created_at) AS review_date, hrh.hosp_id, AVG(hrh.hosp_review_rating) AS avg_rating FROM TB_HOSPITAL_REVIEW_HISTORY hrh GROUP BY DATE(hrh.created_at), hrh.hosp_id ORDER BY review_date, hrh.hosp_id;

SELECT hm.sido_cd_nm AS region, -- 시도명 COUNT(DISTINCT um.user_id) AS user_count, -- 유저 수 COUNT(DISTINCT hm.hosp_id) AS hospital_count -- 병원 수 FROM TB_USER_MASTER um JOIN TB_HOSPITAL_MASTER hm ON um.user_id = hm.hosp_id GROUP BY hm.sido_cd_nm ORDER BY region;
